message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,350,000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  After considering its unique value, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,225,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product's value to me.
